modName: Skimpy partially nude armor and clothes
summary: You should\'ve listened to the blacksmith that told you not to buy discount armor.
descriptionHtml:
Why there are no files, you might ask? All files are removed due to whining of pathetic nooblets.



SKimpy mod by Templar666
==========================

If you\'re crashing with 0.61/0.60, especially when doing some wolf? quest, delete the \'yarlclothes03\' folders in meshes and textures. If that doesn\'t help, delete the mod lol


>>>>>>>>>>> ADULT ONLY CONTENT <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

screenshot1, Left to right: necro, roughspun, master(nocturnal), adept, imerial studded, black robe, mythic dawn
screenshot2, Left to right: blue, steel plate, brown/monk, falmer
screenshot3, Left to right: fur, banded iron, tavern/wench, thalmor
screenshot4, Left to right: stormcloak, glass in low light, glass with more light, nightingale
screenshot5, Left to right: noble, merchant, archmage, ancient nord, dark brotherhood
screenshot6, Left to right: daedric, dragonplate, hide, steel
screenshot7, Left to right: belted tunic, copy paste, fine rainment

==========================

Makes the following armor/clothes/robes skimpy, beat up, torn, worn out

- Ragged prisoner clothes
- Silly necro robe
- Imperial light/studded
- Master mage robes --> Nocturnal, there\'s a bug that some robes show as vanilla
- Noob robe, Apprentice robe and Adept robe
- Black, brown, blue robes
- Mythic dawn robe
- Steel plate armor
- Falmer armor
- Iron & Banded armor
- Fur - Animals don\'t get enough vitamin E 
- Blacksmith apron

0.55

- Wench outfit

0.56

- Thalmor robe

0.59

- Stormcloak cuirasses: generic, Dawnstar, Hjaalmarch, Markarth. Some guards are too fat, because of that there\'s noticeable clipping
- Nightingale armor
- Glass armor

0.60

- Ancient Nord armor
- Dark Brotherhood armor
- Archmage robes
- 3 Noble clothes
- 2 Merchant clothes

0.61

- Daedric armor
- Dragonbone plate armor
- 1 Hide armor
- Steel armor
- Fine and fine rainment clothes
- a bunch of farm copy-paste clothes


===========================================
C.03

 - Banded iron armor
 - Iron armor
 - Stormcloak cuirass (not all)


=============================================
To install:

Copy meshes & textures to skyrim/data

To uninstall: 
Take a look at the folders in the archive and delete them from meshes and textures

=================================================
Content used:

C.03.....
CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling

You need to install this mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888


0.50 - 0.61
Uses the mesh from Nude Females by Thepal

You probably need this nude mod by Thepal
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=70

Everything else is (C) Bethesda



================== Want to mod an outfit? Read this ===================

How to add alpha and a body to the MESH:
Open ***BODY***_0.nif and ***MESH***_0.nif in 2 windows. Copy the MESH main node name(txt) to BODY\'s main node name. Copy the branch from BODY that contains the body (NiTriShape, not the main node) and paste it in the main MESH node. If you get errors, you need to copy whatever\'s missing from the BODY to the MESH main node AND copy paste the txt name from the BODY.
Then you add the NiAlphaProperty to the NiTriShape that contains the armor/clothes AND add the reference to that alpha in NiTriShape by changing Ref from \'none\' to whatever number your alpha has. Your alpha will become linked, otherwise it\'ll be sitting under the main node and won\'t do you any good.
Default Skyrim alpha settings are: flags 4844, threshold 128 which means no blending and the alpha is either on or off.
To add alpha to the texture: open *.dds with DXTBMP.exe, add alpha channel and save.
author: Templar666
